Thanks for Attending Missouri Communications Leadership and Technology Seminar
We would like to extend a sincere thank you for attending TriTech's Leadership Seminar. It was great to be able to meet with you and share leadership insight and technology advancements in the field of public safety communications.
For reference, below is a link to download a case study from our Leadership Seminar hosts, St. Charles County Department of Dispatch and Alarm. In the case study, Executive Director Bob Watts shares how their computer-aided dispatch and mobile data solution from TriTech delivers the following benefits:
Easy IT administration and assured uptime Cross-jurisdictional dispatch for quickest reponse Instant access to real-time incident information for field personnel
Click here to download the case study and read more: http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/VNS_CS_StCharlesCounty.pdf
If you have further questions or woold like to request more information, please feel free to contact your Regional Sales Manager Pam Irons.
